root['summary'].new_value:
Shopping notes for weekly household order

Budget: $180 total

Must-have
- Chicken breast (2 lbs) or turkey if cheaper
- Spinach (fresh, 2 bags)
- Cherry tomatoes
- Avocados (4)
- Brown rice (1 bag)
- Olive oil (small bottle)
- Greek yogurt (no cow’s milk if possible; use a dairy-free option)
- Almond milk (unsweetened)

Pantry / staples
- Black beans (4 cans)
- Chickpeas (2 cans)
- Salsa (medium)
- Oats (1 container)

Household
- Paper towels
- Dish soap
- Trash bags (kitchen size)

Payment reference:
Use the household card on file ending in 4821.

Additional context:
This order is for the Williams household. If there are questions about substitutions,
email kesha.williams@example.com so we can approve changes quickly.

Preferences:
- Avoid brands with artificial fragrances
- Prefer eco-friendly packaging when possible
- Avoid shellfish, beef, pork, soy, tofu, and cow’s milk.

Reminder:
Last week we went over budget slightly, so try to stay close to the $180 limit.
